title: Calls to end gender pay gap in modelling
description: It is not unusual to hear calls for the gender pay gap to be closed, but it's normally women who are getting less money than men. However, in the British fashion industry, female models can often earn double the amount that male models do. Model agencies are saying it is now time to introduce equal pay. Chi Chi Izundu reports.
tags: model agencies are calling for more equality in pay for models,as it's found female models earn more than their male counterparts.
